cast.name: 克里斯·海耶斯 Chris Hayes
克里斯·布鲁诺 Chris Bruno

introduction: Sean O'Donnell has found the shortcut to getting women: the internet. Finding lonely, depressed and antisocial girls, he notches his bedposts as an online dating Casanova. Although his best friend Wes Landings disapproves, Sean leaves a trail of destruction via one night stands and lies.After the death of her boyfriend, Rachel Lerner turns to the internet to begin dating again, to the dismay of her fast living friend Brooke.As Sean's deceit begins to catch up to him in the form of a past conquest Erin and her ex-boyfriend Smitty, Rachel is kidnapped and Sean is the only one who knows.Exploring identity, technology and relationships, WE GO CRAZY is a fast-paced thriller that warns of the dangers of social networking and our digital age.
